messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 2010 - 2015: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household. 2015 - 2020: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
2010 - 2015: Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income. 2015 - 2020: Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary people.

2010 - 2015: Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more health professionals. 2015 - 2020: Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn.
2010 - 2015: Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school. 2015 - 2020: Protect education spending from cradle to grave.

issues.environment: Rosie believes strongly in defending our Green Belt and environment.
issues.health: As a councillor in South London she has successfully campaigned for better schools in her area.

housing.content: Rosie feels Spelthorne is especially poor in looking after the needs of families. She would make family needs a priority.

leaflet.personalStatement: 4 great reasons to vote for Rosie SHIMELL

politicalExperience.achievements: Successfully campaigned for better schools in her area.

contactInformation.address: Return to: Spelthorne Liberal Democrats RTJPS-SGZR-UZBG Shepperton TW17 8EN

images.caption: Rosie SHIMELL - Liberal Democrat Candidate For SPELTHORNE

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by Bishop Printers, Walton Road, Farlington, Portsmouth PO6 1TR. Published and promoted by Terry Luscombe on behalf of Rosie Shimell both at 39 Edinburgh Drive, Staines, TW18 1PJ.
